meanings.def: powerful and very dangerous rays that are sent out from radioactive substances
examples: high levels/doses of radiation that damage cells
the link between exposure to radiation and childhood cancer
a radiation leak from a nuclear power station
Nuclear testing has exposed millions of people to radiation.
The counter showed high levels of radiation.

meanings.def: heat, energy, etc. that is sent out in the form of rays
examples: The ozone layer absorbs solar radiation.

meanings.def: the treatment of cancer and other diseases using radiation
